dialogue.line: Once upon a time somewhere around 2 AM, Multiple Republics (aka MR) was scavenging for berries in a forest.
What they don't know was that they chose to travel at a bad time. As during 3 AM, someone... Or something, lurked in the bushes.
Ofcourse, MR was unaware of this. and so their scavenge for food would soon end up futile.
Jeez, why did i pick such an activity at this time, am i stupid?
I don't remember thinking about going here at such time...
Oh hey! You..? are you perhaps also collecting berries at such time? weird, right?
Could you... tell me where the directions are...
MR passes out... Until 33 minutes later (3:33 AM)
